about.title: About
about.intro: ðŸ‘‹ Hey! I'm Young, an AI product consultant based in Taiwan
about.paragraph1: I spent the last 10+ years building products in EdTech, e-commerce, and NPO sectors. Recently, I've been transferring this expertise to healthcare with great successâ€”leading teams, shipping features that hundreds of thousands of users rely on, and solving real business problems with AI
about.paragraph2: My journey started in education technology, where I built products like Vaitor, Jutor, and Cutor that helped students learn more effectively. I led engineering teams, scaled products from prototype to production, and learned how to translate AI capabilities into tangible business outcomes
about.paragraph3: Now I help organizations navigate AI transformationâ€”from strategy to deployment. I work with companies that are serious about building AI products that drive measurable impact, not just experimenting with the latest hype
about.paragraph4: When I'm not building products, you'll find me writing on Medium about AI product development, speaking at tech conferences, or mentoring the next generation of technical leaders

page.title: About Me
page.subtitle: I turn AI ideas into products in one week
page.belief1: AI should make learning more accessible and equitable for everyone
page.belief2: Products should solve real problems, not chase hype
page.belief3: Fast iteration beats perfect planning every time
page.style2: Use data to validate assumptions, not opinions
page.style3: Teach teams to be self-sufficient, not dependent on consultants
page.ctaSubtitle: Open to AI product development, consulting, and advisory roles

savings.description: Built a data dashboard that replaced expensive external analytics tools at a major EdTech platform. Reduced operational costs by consolidating 5 disparate systems into one unified solution.

growth.description: Led AI product initiatives that grew monthly active users from 200K to 300K+ within 12 months. Achieved through personalized learning features and improved recommendation algorithms.

retention.description: Maintained exceptionally low team attrition while scaling engineering organization from 8 to 25+ members. Built culture of ownership, mentored 10+ technical leaders into senior roles.

product.title: AI Product Development
product.description: Want to build an AI product but don't know where to start? I help you ship a working MVP in 3-6 weeks, plus teach your team how to maintain and scale it. Not just deliveryâ€”I transfer the knowledge.
product.note: $1,500-3,000/hour or Starting at $50,000 â€¢ Typical MVP: 3-6 weeks

strategy.title: AI Strategy Consulting
strategy.description: Organizations wanting to adopt AI but unclear on the approach. I provide AI feasibility assessment, technical architecture design, and 6-12 month implementation roadmap. Methodology proven in education with 300K+ students.

consulting.title: AI Adoption & Training
consulting.description: Purchased AI tools but your team isn't using them? I design customized training programs, lead tool implementation, and ensure your organization actually adopts AI. Focused on EdTech, healthcare, and non-profits.
consulting.note: $5,000-8,000 per half-day â€¢ $8,000-15,000 per full-day workshop

vaitor.title: Vaitor
vaitor.subtitle: AI-Powered Learning Platform
vaitor.description: Led development of an adaptive learning system that personalized content for 300K+ students. Built intelligent tutoring features using NLP and recommendation algorithms that improved learning outcomes by 40%.

healthcare.title: Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
healthcare.subtitle: Data Infrastructure & Analytics
healthcare.description: Replaced 5 expensive external tools with a unified analytics platform, saving $1.2M annually. Built real-time dashboards for clinical decision support and operational insights.

jutor.title: Jutor & Cutor
jutor.subtitle: AI Tutoring Suite
jutor.description: Jutor: AI-powered English learning platform for listening, speaking, reading, and writing (Jutor.ai). Cutor: Chinese writing/essay correction AI assistant. Both tools provide personalized feedback and adaptive practice.

article1.title: Building AI Products That Scale

article3.excerpt: Strategies for mentoring technical leaders and maintaining low team turnover while scaling.

testimonial1.quote: Young's expertise in AI product development transformed our EdTech platform. His strategic approach helped us scale from 200K to 300K users within a year.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.quote: The analytics dashboard Young built saved us $1.2M annually. His ability to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions is exceptional.
testimonial2.author: David Park

testimonial3.quote: Working with Young was a game-changer. He not only delivered on technical execution but also mentored our team, helping us build stronger engineering practices.
testimonial3.author: Lisa Wang
